mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT permission_name FROM users u JOIN role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role,CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) JOIN permission p ON JSON_CONTAINS(r.permissions,CAST(p.id AS CHAR )) WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = MD5(CONCAT( SUBSTRING(MD5(username),1,6), #{newPassword}, SUBSTRING(MD5(username),LENGTH(MD5(username)) - 2, 3) )) WHERE id =#{userId} AND password= MD5(CONCAT( SUBSTRING(MD5(username),1,6), #{oldPassword}, SUBSTRING(MD5(username),LENGTH(MD5(username)) - 2, 3) ))
